node.excerpt: One day a Sunny Man was walking down the road. He saw a Witch. Hey silly Witch,  he called.  You Sunny Man shall be a tree, she cursed himâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Sunny Man who was a tree
frontmatter.description: This is a story of a sunny man, and how he became a tree
